tuv.seg: Blue Flag beaches and marinas in Ireland
Tránna agus Poirt le Bratach Ghorm in Éirinn
The Blue Flag is an international environmental award made to beaches and marinas thoughout the world that demonstrate good environmental standards and good sanitary and safety facilities

Gradam idirnáisiúnta comhshaoil is ea an Bhratach Ghorm a bhronntar ar thránna agus ar mhuiríní ar fud an domhain a léiríonn dea-chaighdeáin chomhshaoil agus áiseanna maithe sláintíochta agus sábháilteachta
The award is made by the Foundation for Environmental Education (FEE), an independent non-profit organisation
Bronann an Fhondúireacht um Oideachas Comshaoil (FOC), eagraíocht neamhspleách neamhbhrabúis, an gradam seo
The Blue Flag award is in place in over 45 countries internationally
Tá an Bhratach Ghorm i bhfeidhm i mbreis agus 45 tír go hidirnáisiúnta
You can find information on the beaches and marinas in Ireland that have received awards at blueflagireland.org
Is féidir leat faisnéis a fháil ar na tránna agus ar na muiríní in Éirinn a bhain gradaim amach ag blueflagireland.org
In Ireland, the Blue Flag is operated by An Taisce
In Éirinn, is iad an Taisce a fheidhmíonn an Bhratach Ghorm
An Taisce also operates a Green Coast Award scheme for beaches that meet EU bathing water quality standards but also retain their natural, unspoilt environment
Feidhmíonn an Taisce, freisin, scéim Gradaim um Chósta Ghlas do thránna a bhaineann caighdeáin cháilíocht uisce an AE amach ach a choimeádann a gcomhshaol nadúrtha gan mhilleadh
You can find out the water quality at Ireland's designated bathing areas at splash.epa.ie
Is féidir leat an cháilíocht uisce a dheimhniú ag na 131 limistéar sannta atá in Éirinn ag splash.epa.ie
There is a Blue Flag worldwide app for smartphones
Tá app Bratach Ghorm do smartphones
A Blue Flag award is awarded to a beach or marina for one season (July to August) only
Bronntar Bratach Ghorm ar thrá nó ar phort ar feadh séasúir amháin (Iúil go Lúnasa)
The award of a Blue Flag to a beach depends on compliance with 32 criteria covering the following aspects:
Ní mór cloí le 32 critéar a bhaineann leis na hábhair seo a leanas le Bratach Ghorm do thránna a fháil:
• Environmental education and information
• Oideachas agus eolas timpeallachta
There are 24 criteria that a marina must comply with
Tá 24 critéir nach mór do muiríne a chomhlíonadh
They cover the same areas of water quality, environmental education and information, environmental management, safety and services
Clúdaíonn siad na réimsí céanna ar cháilíocht uisce, oideachas comhshaoil ​​agus faisnéise, bainistíocht chomhshaoil​​, sábháilteachta agus seirbhísí
A marina can be part of a larger harbour with other activities, if it is clearly separated from other harbour activities
Is féidir a bheith an muiríne chuid de chuan níos mó le gníomhaíochtaí eile, má tá sé scartha go soiléir ó ghníomhaíochtaí chuain eile
The criteria must be adhered to in order to gain a Blue Flag
Ní mór na critéir a cloí le d'fhonn a fháil Brat Gorm
If the criteria are not fulfilled during the season or the conditions change, the Blue Flag may be withdrawn
Más rud é nach bhfuil na critéir comhlíonta le linn an tséasúir nó an t-athrú coinníollacha, d'fhéadfadh an Brat Gorm a tharraingt siar
The Blue Flag criteria are minimum criteria
Is iad na critéir Brataí Goirme critéir íosta
A country can choose to have stricter criteria
Is féidir le tír a roghnú a bhfuil critéir níos déine
You can view the Blue Flag beach criteria and the Blue Flag marina criteria on the blueflagireland.org website
Is féidir leat féachaint na critéir trá Gorm Brait agus na critéir muiríne Gorm Brait ar an suíomh gréasáin blueflagireland.org
The relevant local authority applies for a Blue Flag award for its beaches
Déanann an t-údarás áitiúil cuí iarratas ar Bhratach Ghorm dá thránna
The local authority in question files the application form (with enclosed documentation) and sends it to the National Jury
Cuireann an t-údarás áitiúil an fhoirm chomhlánaithe (leis na cáipéisí faoi iamh) chuig an Giúiré Náisiúnta
For applications for beaches, approved bathing water data from the previous year has to be submitted as documentation together with the application as well
Nuair is trá atá i gceist san iarratas ní mór go mbeadh sonraí maidir le huisce snámha ceadúnaithe ón mbliain roimhe curtha ar fáil i bhfoirm cháipéiseach in éineacht leis an iarratas
The marina owner is responsible for applying for a Blue Flag award for a marina
Is é/í úinéir an phoirt atá freagrach as iarratas a dhéanamh ar Bhratach Ghorm a fháil bronnta ar an bport
To be eligible for the Blue Flag a beach/marina has to fulfill all imperative requirements, and in addition, the fulfillment of a maximum number of guideline criteria is taken into account
Le bheith intofa don Bhratach Ghorm ní mór do thrá/port na riachtanais uilig a chomhlíonadh agus, chomh maith leis sin, cuirtear san áireamh é má chomhlíontar uasmhéid na gcritéar treoirlíne
The National Jury consists of:
Is iad seo a leanas baill an Ghiúiré Náisiúnta:
• Representative Ministry of Environment
• Ionadaí ón Roinn Chomhshaoil
• Association of local authorities
• Cumann na n-údarás áitiúil
The National Jury evaluates applications for compliance with the Blue Flag criteria and gives an approval or rejection on the national level
Déanann an Giúiré Náisiúnta iarratais a mheas le cinntiú go bhfuileadar ag cloí le critéir na Brataí Goirme agus ceadaíonn nó diúltaíonn sé an t-iarratas ag leibhéal náisiúnta
In special cases, the National Jury can propose a dispensation
I gcásanna speisialta, is féidir leis an Giúiré Náisiúnta deonú a thabhairt
The approved applications and the dispensations are then forwarded by the National Jury to the International Jury
Cuireann an Giúiré Náisiúnta ar aghaidh ansin na hiarratais cheadúnaithe agus na deonuithe chuig an Giúiré Idirnáisiúnta
The International Jury consists of:
Ná daoine seo a leanas atá ar an ngiúiré idirnáisiúnta:
• Five representatives from the Foundation for Environmental Education
• Cúigear ionadaí ón bhFondúireacht um Oideachas Timpeallachta
• One representative from the United Nations Environment Programme
• Ionadaí amháin ó Chlár Timpeallachta na Náisiún Aontaithe
• One representative from the World Tourism Organization
• Ionadaí amháin ón Eagraíocht Turasóireachta Domhanda
• One representative from the European Union for Coastal Conservation
• Ionadaí amháin ó Aontas na hEorpa um Chothabháil Chósta
• One representative from the European Parliament - Environmental Committee
• Ionadaí amháin ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa - Coiste Timpeallachta
The International Jury carries out an evaluation before it finally decides which beaches and marinas will be awarded the Blue Flag for the season
Déanann an Giúiré Idirnáisiúnta meastóireacht roimh cinneadh deireanach a thógáil cé na tránna agus na poirt a mbronnfar an Bhratach Ghorm orthu don séasúr
